Posts.EditableText: Just a quick question,I have started my second game off in 5.2 and I really have tried to move up to 5.3 and 5.4 but cannot seem to get on with it with all the extra addons Alex has put in and the changes. I'm not thick by all means but cannot get my head round it all. I was wondering how many others would stay on 5.2 and is it worth trying to finish the game in 5.2. By the way rock on Tomb Raider just finished not bad at all. Happy Adventuring

Posts.EditableText: Thanks to both of you for the replies and thanks for offering assistance but it's when I look at all the questions about various new menus and other problems I think to myself this is out of my league. Also things like getting rid of the header and inserting html. It was easier to do in earlier versions. And I know, and understand that programming does not stand still. But hey never mind will try again. Thanks once again both Happy Adventuring.
